title: Six dead as violence continues in Israel and Palestinian territories - live updates | World news | The Guardian
summary: netanyahu condemns attack by jewish teenager .

text: we 're pausing this blog for now but you can keep abreast of latest developments on our israel page .
the guardian 's graphics team have put together this map laying out the locations of the incidents at the centre of the latest tensions .
map of recent lethal incidents in israel and the occupied palestinian territories .
palestinian medical sources have provided an update on injuries , reports rania zabaneh of al jazeera .
they are said to include at least 272 wounded in the west bank ( 24 by live fire ) and 64 in gaza ( 32 by live fire ) .
she adds that the latest palestinian fatality in gaza was ziad nabil sharaf , a 20-year-old .
the death toll in gaza has now risen to six , according to reports .
hazem balousha ( @ ihazemi ) one more palestinian killed to raise the death toll in # gaza to 6 .
injuries reached 60 according to medics .
it 's a figure that 's expected to rise further however as a number of severe injuries are being dealt with , according to belal dabour , a palestinian doctor in gaza .
my colleague mona mahmood has been speaking to jamal abdu razaq , a 30-year-old palestinian in hay al-rimal , gaza , speaks about the situation in his town .
i did not take part in the wider demonstrations in gaza today after friday prayers because the situation is very risky and not the same as how the protests are treated in the west bank .
the protesters there can see the israeli soldiers at the checkpoints but in gaza , you ca n't see any .
they 're all hiding in faraway fortified sites on the border , however , but snipers are shooting people .
though the protesters do not pose any threat to the israeli soldiers the fire is excessive .
the protests are not saying that they want to liberate their country all they want to say is that the world has to stop israeli tyranny , arrogance and their inhuman practices against us .
i have just got back from al-shifa hospital , people were saying that all the injuries are in the heads .
this is very risky and those who are protesting are really putting themselves at risk .

the protests now are a way of young men expressing their solidarity with the people in the west bank , to make them feel that we are a sole country and we support them in their demand to have their rights .
no military confrontation can happen between the occupation forces and common people .
the israeli army is in panic and fires against any man they see in front of them.the martyrs would be followed by more demonstrations for sure .
we hope things would not escalate to a real war .
the mounting tension has empowered hardliners on both sides , reports peter beaumont , the guardian 's jerusalem correspondent , who has filed a wrap up of developments here .

he observes : the reality is that neither side appears fully in control amid lone wolf '' stabbing attacks by palestinians and attempted lynchings by israelis - including an incident in the seaside town of netanya on thursday night when a mob set on three palestinians .

underlining these concerns , the israeli public security minister , gilad erdan , told journalists at the scene of an attack on a 15-year-old yeshiva student in jerusalem : jewish terrorists are also taking part in attacks .
we wo n't allow anyone to take the law into their own hands . ''

palestinian anger is largely focused on events at al-aqsa mosque compound in jerusalem 's old city and fears that israel is trying to change the status quo at the holy site , revered by muslims as the noble sanctuary and by jews as the temple mount .
netanyahu has denied wanting to change conditions under which jews are allowed to visit the site .
peter also has more on one of friday 's most significant developments , the declaration by hamas 's leader in gaza that the current unrest in jerusalem and the west bank as an intifada .
a palestinian protester hurls stones at israeli soldiers during clashes on the israeli border eastern gaza .
hana/ap

the woman who was shot after allegedly attempting to stab a security guard in afula , northern israel , is a 30-year-old resident of nazereth who had no record of security offences or islamist links .
that 's according the shin bet , as tweeted by dan williams of reuters .
dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) shin bet : woman shot for attempted afula stabbing is a 30-year-old nazareth resident with no record of security offenses or islamist links .
some are also emerging of the scene north of jerusalem where israeli emergency services say that stones were thrown at cars .
paramedics treated six people .
magen david adom ( @ mdais ) # breaking stones thrown at israeli cars near shilo .
@ twitterid # paramedics treated 6 victims in a mild condition .
ynetnews has more on that incident , reporting that the six included two children .
all were said to be lightly injured .
here 's another potential new flashpoint .

a large israeli military contingent is reported to be currently carrying out a search of the village of kfar azon in the west bank after a palestinian stole a soldier 's rifle amid disturbances there .
ynetnews ( @ ynetnews ) palestinian in kfar azon in west bank steals soldier 's weapon and flees - update : palestinian police have reportedly tracked down the rifle and returned it .
the palestinian news agency ma'an says one of those shot dead by the idf in gaza has been identified as 15-year-old muhammad al-raqeb by the gazan health ministry .
it also reports 20 palestinians being treated for teargas inhalation in nablus , in the west bank .
ma'an news agency ( @ maannewsagency ) breaking : # palestinian injured by live fire , 20 suffer tear gas inhalation in # nablus clashes # palestine
the condition of the woman who was shot after allegedly attempting to stab a security guard in afula , northern israel , is unclear .

from the video , it looks like she may have been killed ( and some palestinian activists on social media are saying that she was ) but israeli media reports say that she suffered moderate '' injuries and that the shots were fired at her lower half .
the israel defence forces said that she had been neutralised '' .
the death toll in gaza keeps rising : daniel nisman ( @ dannynis ) gaza border riot casualties have risen to 5- largest toll since the 2014 conflict .
militant groups will have to respond , likely with rockets conflict news ( @ conflicts ) video : clashes between # idf and palestinians at # gaza border .
4 palestinians dead , over 30 injured - @ twitterid

my colleague mona mahmood has spoken to hadeel tareq , a 22-year-old from gaza who said her family took part in today 's protests , where four people have reportedly been killed [ the interview was before the fourth death was confirmed ] after being shot by the israel defence forces .
tareq said : my family and all our neighbours took part in the demonstrations today which marched after friday prayers .
most of the young men went on demonstrations from all the mosques in gaza in solidarity with the west bank and al-aqsa mosque and toured the streets in gaza .
then , they headed to the nearest checkpoint of the israeli army in a district called nahel auz .
it is a military site it was a message of protest to the israelis in which the protesters were throwing stones at the israeli army .
there was a massive return of fire by the israeli army , which led to the killing of three young men and 20 more injured .
the ambulances are so busy in my district now transferring the victims to the hospitals in shuja'ayia district .
the confrontations are still going on and the situation is tense .
we are all in a state of alert and we expect an escalation of violence in gaza within coming days .
last year , the war was in the west bank but soon it reached gaza and it was so difficult to contain it .
it is not clear what the reaction will be when the martyrs are received by their families from the hospital , as most of the people are so upset now .

documents.title: fourth palestinian killed in gaza
text: the death toll in gaza is reported to have risen to four .
yousef m. aljamal ( @ yousefaljamal ) fourth palestinian killed in clashes with iof to the east of khan younis .
name : hamouda mohssien belal dabour - gaza ( @ belalmd12 ) breaking : a 19 year old palestinian killed in clashes with israeli soldiers east of khanyounis .
4 protesters martyred in gaza so far today .
israel news feed ( @ israelhatzolah ) breaking photos : at least 4 arab terrorists dead & 30 injured by idf fire during serious clashes at the gaza border .
video has emerged of the moment an israeli arab woman who tried to stab a security guard in afula was shot by police .
she appeared to be stationary .
her hands - at least one of which was holding something - are held up at times but she also appears to wave them about ( the view is partially obscured by police officers ) .
one reporter suggests she was speaking to someone on the phone as she was shot .
several shots were fired .
warning : readers may find footage upsetting israel news feed ( @ israelhatzolah ) dramatic video : moments of arab terrorist being shot by israeli forces in afula after attempted stabbing attack .
six people have been stabbed despite the deployment of thousands of extra police officers in an attempt to stop the violence which has left 11 dead over the past week .
four arabs were stabbed in dimona , in the negev desert , in a nationalistic '' attack .
a 17-year-old jewish suspect was arrested .
the perpetrator was said to have described his victims - reportedly three palestinian construction workers and one bedouin municipal worker from the west bank as terrorists '' .
a jewish youth ( reportedly aged 14 to 16 ) was stabbed in jerusalem .
he was said to have suffered light injuries .
an arab suspect was arrested , israeli police said .
a police officer was stabbed at the entrance to the kiryat arba settlement in the west bank .
he suffered light injuries , according to israeli police , which said his attacker - a palestinian - was shot dead after he tried to grab the officer 's gun .
a female israeli arab was shot after she attempted to stab a security guard at a bus station in afula , in northern israel .
she is said to have suffered moderate '' injuries .
the israeli prime minister , binyamin netanyahu , strongly condemned the harming of innocent arabs '' .
he said whoever deploys violence will be brought to justice .
israel defence forces soldiers have opened fire on palestinian protesters near a gaza border fence .
palestinian sources say two people have been killed .
hamas has said a new intifada is taking place .
we call for escalating and deepening the intifada , '' ismail haniyeh said after friday prayers .
thousands of palestinians have lined the streets for the funeral of a teenager who was shot dead after stabbing two israeli jews to death .
the funeral of mohanad al-halabi , 19 , took place in al-bireh , near ramallah .
a third palestinian has reportedly been shot dead by israel defence forces in gaza .
daniel nisman ( @ dannynis ) palestinian hospitals in west bank ordered to go on high alert .
in gaza , 3 dead , 20 injured in israeli military protest crackdown .
the female attacker at the afula bus station was reportedly an israeli arab and not a palestinian as first reported .
dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) woman shot and wounded while trying to stab guard at afula bus station is an israeli arab - @ twitterid police

documents.title: two shot dead in gaza
text: a second palestinian has reportedly died after being shot by the israel defence forces in gaza : belal dabour - gaza ( @ belalmd12 ) breaking : shadi douleh is a second martyr killed by iof in clashes east of gaza .
2 killed in gaza so far , and +15 injuries .
ahmed herbawi , 20 , from gaza has been killed by israeli forces during clashes on the eastern borders .
quds newspaper is reporting violent clashes in the occupied west bank , in al-bireh , hebron , huwara , beit el .

it is also reporting the body of muhannad halabi , who was shot and killed by israeli police after he allegedly shot and killed two ultra-orthodox jewish men in jerusalem 's old city , has been returned to his family .
it also reports that the funeral has just been held in al-bireh , ramallah , and that it is the largest funeral to be held in the region this year [ see below ] .
palestine social ( @ palestinesocial ) funeral of martyr mohanad al-halabi in al-bireh after friday prayer today .
# palestine # palestineresists

documents.title: clashes reported in gaza
text: there have also been disturbances reported in gaza : belal dabour - gaza ( @ belalmd12 ) gaza stands with jerusalem .
9 injuries reported so far in clashes with iof east of # gaza 's shujaiya .
ynetnews ( @ ynetnews ) idf opens fire on protesters near # gaza border fence , wounding two # ynet
hamas has said there is a new intifada taking place .

agence france-presse ( @ afp ) # breaking : hamas gaza chief says ongoing unrest in west bank is a new 'intifada ' luke baker ( @ lukereuters ) # hamas plays up talk of a third intifada : `` we call for escalating and deepening the intifada , '' ismail haniyeh after friday prayers
this video purports to show the aftermath of the attempted attack at a bus station in afula , in northern israel ( see previous update ) .

amichai stein ( @ amichaistein1 ) # breaking : # palestinian woman tried to stab a security guard at # afula central bus station - was shot & injured it is the second attack in afula in less than 24 hours .
on thursday evening , a soldier there was stabbed and his attacker captured , authorities said .

documents.title: attempted stabbing in afula
text: an attempted stabbing by a palestinian woman is reported in the northern city of afula .
israel news flash ( @ ilnewsflash ) breaking - afula : palestinian female terrorist attempted to carry out stabbing attack near central bus station .

ynetnews ( @ ynetnews ) # breaking : attempted stabbing near afula bus station , terrorist shot and moderately wounded # ynet dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) woman believed to be palestinian tries to stab guard at bus station in afula , northern israel ; she 's shot and moderately wounded - @ twitterid
the attacker of the police officer near hebron was killed , israeli police say : micky rosenfeld ( @ mickyrosenfeld ) knife used by arab terrorist in stabbing attack in kiryat arba .
terrorist shot and killed .

haaretz reports that the two jewish victims of stabbings today - one a boy , variously aged as 14,15 or 16 , and the other a police officer - are the ninth and tenth israelis ( presumably they mean israeli jews ) to be wounded in stabbing attacks over the past 24 hours .
israeli police have described the assailant of the officer in kiryat arba as a palestinian terrorist '' : micky rosenfeld ( @ mickyrosenfeld ) attack in kiryat arba .
policeman stabbed by palestinian .
police shot the terrorist at the scene .
area closed off .
officer in light condition

the and video below show muslims barred from jerusalem 's old city today ( the police are only letting in men aged 45 plus and women ) praying : jacob burns ( @ jacobtburns ) praying in the streets near damascus gate amid heavy security # jerusalem william booth ( @ boothwilliam ) muslims barred from entry to al aqsa and old city do friday prayers at barricade .
heavy security today .
this is the scene of the stabbing of a jewish youth , tweeted by israel 's national emergency service .
magen david adom ( @ mdais ) @ mdais photos of the stabbing scene now in # jerusalem :

documents.title: netanyahu condemns attack by jewish teenager
text: the israeli prime minister , binyamin netanyahu , has condemned the stabbings by a jewish teenager , his office says .
ofir gendelman ( @ ofirgendelman ) pm netanyahu strongly condemns the attack on innocent arabs .
israel is a nation of law and order.1/2 ofir gendelman ( @ ofirgendelman ) we will bring to justice anyone who engages in violence and breaks the law .

documents.title: israeli police officer stabbed
text: yet another stabbing to report , i 'm afraid : dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) israeli policeman stabbed at entrance to kiryat arba settlement in west bank ; assailant tries to grab his gun , is shot - @ twitterid police the assailant was reportedly arrested .
ynet says the jewish youth stabbed ( see previous updates ) was a member of the ultra-orthodox haredi sect .
ynetnews ( @ ynetnews ) haredi teen stabbed in terror attack in # jerusalem , lightly injured .
attacker neutralized
a spokesman for israel police says it has detained someone for the stabbing of the jewish youth , describing it as a confirmed terror attack '' .
micky rosenfeld ( @ mickyrosenfeld ) minutes ago in jerusalem arab suspect stabbed 14 yrs old , injured lightly .
police units arrest suspect near scene .
confirmed terror attack

documents.title: jewish youth stabbed
text: a 14-year-old is reportedly suffering from light injuries .
ben hartman ( @ benhartman ) jerusalem police : stabbing on shmuel hanavi street , 14 yr old jewish victim with light injuries .
suspect arrested .
the old city at the moment is under very , very high security .
there have been metal detectors installed at the different old city gates .
in the city at the moment , there are a lot of barriers but it 's quiet at the moment .
the restrictions at the al-aqsa mosque mean no muslim men under the age of 45 are allowed in .
quite a lot of people have n't been allowed to come in .
usually when security is high , violence is less likely but there 's a sense that everyone is waiting to see what will happen .

the comments coming out of the israeli prime minister , binyamin netanyahu 's office and that of the palestinian president , mahmoud abbas , they have said they do not want any sort of escalation [ of the violence ] but it 's not completely clear they are leading the demonstrations or in control of what 's happening on the ground .

some more updates on the stabbing : ben hartman ( @ benhartman ) negev police update : jewish attacker suspected of stabbing 4 arabs in dimona is a 17 yr old local , not a man in his 20s as said earlier ben hartman ( @ benhartman ) mda : wounded in dimona attack include 42 yr old laborer stabbed in upper body , two in their 50s w/light injuries to extremities ( and a 4th ) ben hartman ( @ benhartman ) mks uri ariel , moti yogev from right-wing jewish home party send statements condemning `` revenge attacks '' , `` vigilantism '' after dimona attack middle east eye ( @ middleeasteye ) israeli police spox tells mee : negev stabbing attack carried out 'in revenge ' for violence targeting jewish israelis

the uk foreign secretary , philip hammond has just released a statement condemning the recent violence in israel and the occupied palestinian territories : i continue to be deeply concerned by violent clashes across the occupied palestinian territories and israel which have resulted in a number of deaths and hundreds of injuries .
we condemn all acts of violence , including attacks by palestinians and by israeli settlers .
we urge all sides to take immediate steps to de-escalate the tensions and avoid actions that threaten to exacerbate the situation .
every israeli and palestinian has the right to live in peace and security .
we understand , and share , the deep frustration on all sides at the lack of progress on the middle east peace process .
the current violence underlines that a just and lasting resolution that ends the occupation and delivers peace for both israelis and palestinians is long overdue .
ynet has an image of one of the victims ynetnews ( @ ynetnews ) 3 arab victims in dimona attack said to be municipal workers @ twitterid # ynet
this is from reuters on the stabbings : the stabbings took place in the town of dimona and were all were believed to have been carried out by the same suspect , police said .
as of now there are four stabbings , '' spokeswoman luba samri said , adding that the motive appeared to be nationalistic '' .
the first man stabbed was a municipal worker who was moderately wounded by the assailant .
another arab was stabbed near a school , she said .
details of the other two stabbings and the condition of the victims were not immediately clear .
the mayor of dimona , benny biton , told israel radio the suspect was a resident of the town who was known to police '' .

four israelis have been killed in stabbings in jerusalem and a drive-by shooting in the occupied west bank since last week , and there have been several such attacks by palestinians within israel that caused injuries but no fatalities .

on thursday , jerusalem 's mayor and mayors in other cities urged residents who have gun licenses to carry their weapons with them , a call that prompted some politicians to warn against vigilantism .

the suspect arrested for the stabbings told police his victims are terrorists '' , according to reuters reporter luke baker : luke baker ( @ lukereuters ) jewish suspect arrested for stabbing four arabs in southern israel tells police he believes `` all those he stabbed are terrorists ''
the number of victims of the previously reported stabbing attacks has now risen to four with the incidents said to be nationalistically '' motivated .
dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) confirming four arabs stabbed in dimona , @ twitterid police say jewish suspect believed responsible for all attacks & `` nationalistically '' motivated .

dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) jewish suspect in dimona stabbing spree against arabs is a resident of the town who is `` known to police '' - mayor benny biton to @ twitterid ben hartman ( @ benhartman ) mda : dimona wounded include 4 hurt , 2 moderately , 2 lightly .
two separate stabbing incidents in city they say .
ben hartman ( @ benhartman ) mda says stabbing attacks on 4 arabs in dimona were in spots - at 9am on gdolei yisrael street , and 3 stabbed on ben-gurion st. at
another ( third ) person was reportedly wounded in the attacks by a jewish suspect , reported earlier .
israel news feed ( @ israelhatzolah ) breaking update : 3 arabs wounded after being stabbed in dimona , israeli suspect caught & arrested , motive unknown .
jonah mandel ( @ mandeljonah ) now @ twitterid updating that 3 arabs were stabbed in dimona , 1 moderately wounded , 2 lightly ; @ twitterid police have arrested a jewish suspect

jacob burns is monitoring events in jerusalem today for amnesty international and has been tweeting updates ( nb in the first tweet it says access is restricted to palestinians aged 50 plus - this has now been changed to 45 plus and only applies to men ) : jacob burns ( @ jacobtburns ) a heavy police presence this morning in # jerusalem , and access to # alaqsa is restricted to palestinians aged 50+ jacob burns ( @ jacobtburns ) roads linking palestinian neighbourhoods wadi al joz and al tur to old city are closed # jerusalem jacob burns ( @ jacobtburns ) haroon al rashid st also closed off .
this checkpoint just turned away a boy of about 11 from passing # jerusalem jacob burns ( @ jacobtburns ) herod 's gate .
police checking papers of those who want to enter # jerusalem

documents.title: two israeli arabs stabbed
text: a reuters reporter says two israeli arabs have been stabbed : dan williams ( @ danwilliams ) two israeli arabs stabbed in separate incidents in dimona , jewish suspect arrested - @ twitterid police

haaretz reports that hundreds of right wing protesters marched through jerusalem chanting death to arabs '' last night , attempting to enter the palestinian neighbourhood of silwan in east jerusalem .
four were arrested during the demonstration , including bentzi gopstein , head of the far-right lehava organization .
a group of demonstrators entered the western wall plaza and appeared to be searching for arabs .
the israeli website reports that the demonstration came after a day of no less than seven lone-wolf terror attacks against israeli jews in israel and the west bank '' .

documents.title: opening summary
text: israel is beefing up its police presence in jerusalem today amid fears of violence ahead of friday prayers .
police have said only muslims women and men above the age of 45 will be allowed access to the old city to pray .
on thursday they had set the age limit at 50 but they lowered it today .
the restrictions have been imposed after four israelis and seven palestinians were killed over the past week .
hundreds of palestinians have also been wounded in demonstrations and clashes across the west bank and east jerusalem .
hamas has called for a day of rage '' in response to the desecration of al-aqsa '' , according to an israeli website .
many palestinians believe israel is trying to expand jewish presence at the site of the al-aqsa mosque .
israel adamantly denies the claim .

the israeli prime minister , binyamin netanyahu , banned all israeli cabinet ministers and mps from visiting the hilltop compound , which is holy to both muslims and jews , in an effort to calm the tensions .

key_events.text:
10.43am BST
10:43
Netanyahu condemns attack by Jewish teenager

1.57pm BST
13:57
Fourth Palestinian killed in Gaza

1.02pm BST
13:02
Two shot dead in Gaza

bulletin.text: Six Palestinians shot dead by IDF in Gaza.
Attacker of Israeli police officer shot dead.
Israeli Arab woman carrying knife shot by police.
Three Palestinians, a West Bank Bedouin and Jewish teenager stabbed.
Hamas says there is new intifada.
